Question & Options:
Which characters are involved in the events surrounding the Centipede punishment in *The Human Centipede 3 (Final Sequence)*?
Options:
A. A) Bill
B. B) Dwight
C. C) Daisy
D. D) Inmates
Correct Answer: A) Bill, B) Dwight, D) Inmates

Question & Options:
Which characters are involved in the creation or execution of the Centipede punishment in 'The Human Centipede 3 (Final Sequence)'?
Options:
A. A) Bill
B. B) Dwight
C. C) Dr. Jones
D. D) The Inmates
Correct Answer: A) Bill, B) Dwight, D) The Inmates
